message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9,000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still thinking $9,000 is the sweet spot for me. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're sticking to your guns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $9,000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still thinking $9,000 is the right price for me. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
